rooms.description: A spacious living area with Kerala-style wooden panels and murals reflecting traditional motifs.
Open concept kitchen integrated with a dining space. Equipped with modern amenities yet retains traditional Kerala stone accents.
Spacious master bedroom featuring natural ventilation and Vastu-compliant north-east orientation for positive energy flow.
Comfortable guest/child bedroom with south-western facing windows to allow ample natural light while maintaining privacy.
Dedicated study area located in the east for optimal morning light and focus. Incorporates a window seat with traditional carvings.
Well-equipped private gym placed in the west to ensure privacy and adhere to Vastu principles, ensuring balance of energy in the penthouse studio.

openings.description: Large windows along the south wall to enhance natural light and allow views of the exterior garden.
